law.catch_line: An applicant for a State junk license shall:...
law.text:
An applicant for a State junk license shall:
certify to the clerk the applicant's name and business address; and
pay to the clerk a license fee of:
$10 for a junk dealer or scrap metal processor license, if the applicant is a resident of the State;
$5 for an agent license, if the applicant is a resident of the State; or
$100 for a junk dealer or scrap metal processor license or agent license, if the applicant is not a resident of the State.
